sessions.description: Presentación de KHIPUx Ilo y visión del KHIPU

sessions.title_es: El Rol de la IA en la Preservación y Revitalización de Lenguas Indígenas
sessions.title_en: The Role of AI in the Preservation and Revitalization of Indigenous Languages
sessions.description: Keynote exploring how AI technologies can help preserve and revitalize indigenous languages around the world.

sessions.title_es: Panel: Desafíos y Oportunidades: Implementando IA en Contextos Culturales Nativos
sessions.title_en: Panel: Challenges & Opportunities: Implementing AI in Native Cultural Contexts
sessions.description: Discussion with researchers from the 'Neural Machine Translator for Native Language Aimara' project, and experts in Quechua and Shipibo-Conibo translation.

sessions.title_es: Sesiones de Charlas Técnicas: Desarrollo de PNL para Lenguas Nativas
sessions.title_en: Technical Talks: NLP Development for Native Languages
sessions.description: Presentations on data collection, AI models, and technical challenges for low-resource languages.

sessions.title_es: Taller: Introducción a la IA para el Lenguaje Natural
sessions.title_en: Workshop: Introduction to AI for Natural Language
sessions.description: Hands-on interactive session covering basic concepts and tools for NLP.
Including the 'Neural Machine Translator for Native Language Aimara' prototype demonstration.
Facilitated connections between researchers and community members to identify collaboration opportunities.

sessions.title_es: Ética de la IA y Soberanía de Datos en Comunidades Indígenas
sessions.title_en: AI Ethics and Data Sovereignty in Indigenous Communities
sessions.description: Invited talk exploring the ethical considerations and data rights for indigenous communities in AI development.

sessions.title_es: Panel de Liderazgo Comunitario: Visión Aimara
sessions.description: ¿Cómo la IA puede potenciar nuestro futuro? - With influential leaders and representatives of the Aymara community.

sessions.title_es: Taller: Identificación de Proyectos y Oportunidades de Colaboración
sessions.description: Ideation and project planning session for AI-Aymara collaborations.
Teams formed during the summit present initial ideas for collaborative projects.

sessions.title_es: Mesa Redonda: Próximos Pasos y Construcción de Comunidad
sessions.description: Final discussion on building the KHIPUx Aymara community and next steps.
